      • hasCustomUserImage

        boolean hasCustomUserImage(Long userId)
        Return whether a user uploaded a custom image.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user exists and has a custom image, false otherwise

      • loadImage

        ImageVO loadImage(Long userId)
        Get the user image
        Parameters:
        userId - The users id.
        Returns:
        The image.

      • removeUserImage

        boolean removeUserImage(Long userId)
                 throws AuthorizationException,
                        UserNotFoundException
        Remove the image of a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user whose image should be removed
        Returns:
        true if the image was removed or false if the user did not have a custom image
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be updated or the current user is not client manager or internal system user
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist

      • updateImage

        void updateImage(Long userId,
                 byte[] largeUserImage)
          throws AuthorizationException,
                 UserNotFoundException
        Update the image of a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The users id.
        largeUserImage - The user image as byte array.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be updated or the current user is not client manager or internal system user
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist

      • updateNotificationConfig

        void updateNotificationConfig(Map<MessagerConnectorType,MessagerConnectorConfigTO> connectorConfigs)
        Updates the notification configuration of the current user by adding new, removing or updating existing messager connector configurations.
        Parameters:
        connectorConfigs - a definition with the new connector configurations. Configurations for connector types that are not yet part of the notification configuration of the current user will be added. Configurations with connector types that are part of the current notification configuration but that are not listed in the mapping will be removed. All the the other configurations will be updated if necessary.

      • updateUserProfile

        void updateUserProfile(Long userId,
                       UserProfileVO userProfile)
        Updates the user profile in the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - The users id.
        userProfile - The profile.
